blurb: In Samson–the last of the judges–we see a leader of unprecedented power leading a life of unbridled selfishness. We have a judge, in other words, who’s no better than his people with no interest in saving them. But still God uses him. And in his story we get a glimpse of the future–of how God saves, and whom.
speaker: Matt McCullough
title: Last But Not Least
